name: Battle Pong (UnsnugHero)
description:
This is a twist on pong where players can shoot lasers at one another. This game is 2-Player and local only. Whoever scores 10 points first wins.

Controls:

  • Player 1: WASD and LShift to shoot
  • Player2: Arrow Keys and RShift to shoot
  • Escape to quit
  • Enter to Start/Serve
